snippet.title: [ENG] TRAILER - OSTERA : THE CURSE OF...
snippet.description:
Discover "Ostera: The Curse of...", a management and strategy game where you take on the role of the village chief of Belharock. After becoming chief by a twist of fate and inadvertently crushing your predecessor, you find yourself at the heart of a more or less functional universe that mixes magic and technology. Guided by Nicolas, a mischievous fallen god in a straitjacket, you realize that the fate of your village rests in your hands.

Try the demo on steam !

🔮 A Curse to Break:
A curse looms over the land, and you are the one chosen to break it. The time for adventure has come! In "Ostera: The Curse of...", experience a humorous saga where you are the hero, rich in cultural references, comic absurdities, and moral dilemmas through the lens of the strange.

🏡 Village Management:
Carefully choose your responses while maintaining the village's vital resources and the satisfaction of its inhabitants. A delicate and complex balancing act where every decision counts.

🌍 Explore the World:
With Nicolas by your side, embark on rich and enlightening adventures. Admire diverse sceneries and face unforeseen events, making each adventure even crazier than the last one.

⚔️ Narrative Battles:
A medieval fantasy adventure without combat? No way! Pulverize the monsters and mischievous children who stand in your way through narrative battles. Every choice you make will impact the outcome of your duel... Good luck!

✨ Player Testimonials:
"An incredibly fun and engaging game! The humor and storyline kept me hooked." - [Gandhi]
"The perfect blend of management and adventure. Can't wait for the full release!" - [Einstein]
"A unique and entertaining experience. The characters are just fantastic!" - [Moliere]
"Animation, art direction, and dialogue humor are top-notch!" - [bonneetoilejv]

🌟 Join the Adventure:
Help us bring "Ostera: The Curse of..." to life by supporting our Kickstarter campaign. Your support will help us finalize the game and make it even more extraordinary!

🔗 Support us on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ostera-the-curse-of/ostera-the-curse-of?ref=clipboard-prelaunch
📸 Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/profitstrollstudio/
🐦 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Profits_troll
💬 Join our Discord community: https://discord.gg/4T67gAwN

Thank you for being part of this incredible journey. Together, let's make Ostera: The Curse of... a resounding success! 🚀✨
